panels.description:
The current rate of transaction commits for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Commits * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)

targets.query: $nodes AND sub_id:$subid AND NuoMon.NodeShortType:TE AND timestamp:>now-2m

panels.title: Commits/sec

panels.description:
The current rate of transaction rollbacks for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Rollbacks * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)

targets.query: $nodes AND sub_id:$subid AND NuoMon.NodeShortType:TE AND timestamp:>now-2m

panels.title: Rollbacks/sec

panels.description:
Current count of SQL Client Socket Connections to TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.ClientCncts)

targets.query: $nodes AND sub_id:$subid AND NuoMon.NodeShortType:TE AND timestamp:>now-2m

panels.title: Connections

panels.description:
The current rate of transaction updates for TE Nodes.

targets.query: $nodes AND sub_id:$subid AND NuoMon.NodeShortType:TE AND timestamp:>now-2m

panels.title: Row Updates/sec

panels.description:
Graph of Client Connections per NuoDB TE Node.
(NuoMon.ClientCncts)
panels.title: Connections

panels.description:
Graph of processing time, starting from the point when a request is received from an application client until a response is sent back to the client.  Displayed by TE Node.
(NuoMon.SqlListenerSqlProcTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: SQL Processing Time

panels.description:
Graph of the current rate of transaction commits for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Commits * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Commits/secs

panels.description:
Graph of the current rate of transaction rollbacks for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Rollbacks * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Rollbacks/secs

panels.description:
Graph of the current rate of transaction inserts for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Inserts * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Rows Inserted / sec

panels.description:
Graph of the current rate of transaction updates for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Updates * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Rows Updates/secs

panels.description:
Graph of the current rate of transaction deletes for TE Nodes.
(NuoMon.Deletes * 1000.0 / NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Rows Deleted/secs

panels.description:
Graph of time a TE node waited on pending updates.  Displayed by TE node.
(NuoMon.PendingUpdateWaitTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Update Pending Wait Time

panels.description:
Graph of time a TE node waited on pending inserts.  Displayed by TE node.
(NuoMon.PendingInsertWaitTime/NuoMon.Milliseconds)
panels.title: Inserts Pending Wait Time
